item.description:
I'm headed to Welch-Dickey on Saturday and looking to see if there's interest in car pooling. A manageable 4.5 mile loop hike in the Waterville Valley area... Microspikes should be fine, poles will help as there are some steep, icy and/or exposed sections where extra stabilization wouldn't hurt. See the following URL for more details...

http://www.hikenewengland.com/WelchDickey030719.html

I'll add map directions later but just wanted to get this out there to see if there's interest to car pool..

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Welch-Dickey Loop - Waterville Valley, NH
